channel.title: When Black Mesa Is Released: What Then?
channel.description:
When Black Mesa is finally released, what does that mean? The community--will it die out? No more funny threads with our favorite community? No more complaining about the mod not being released? No more hype about the epic mod? No more flame wars over trivial subjects? No more Raminator? What will happen?
What do YOU predict?

item.title: When Black Mesa Is Released: What Then?
item.dc:creator: Mr_X
item.description:
That is true.
Respect points would be duly awarded for that if I could.

I have agreed to abide by certain resst-rric-tionsss…

Read full topic

item.title: When Black Mesa Is Released: What Then?
item.dc:creator: Mr_X
item.description:
xalener:

May have something to do with Raminator’s comment about all major chunks of work being done, and now they’re just adding finishing touches/ polishing.

Which in itself can take a year. Testing is tedious, strenuous shit.

Actually, from a pro point of view, testing can be double the developing time actually. And you can’t even test to 100% accuracy! :’(

With Valve being silent on HL (Ep) 3 and BM not being released since ages.
My HL sustinance… I NEED IT like Dr. House needs his Vicodin!

Read full topic

item.description:
DrasarSalman:

Lambda source - Opposing force
Barney source - Blue shift
City 17 source - hl2 (with l4d engine)
and so on…

Ain’t no rest for the wicked!

Eh? Actually,
Operation Black Mesa : https://www.obmsource.com/
Guard Duty: https://www.moddb.com/mods/guardduty
City 17 Source: https://www.Lolwut.com

PS: Elephant cages something… again…

item.title: When Black Mesa Is Released: What Then?
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
NomadHH:

i think this forum will still have alot of the fun stuff for sure. but i also think it will have other stuff. like alot of. “what did you do to get passed ??? part of the game” or “improvement suggestions” or a thread were you can tell about glitches or something. or mabey even a thread about how cool it is lol.

Or a thread about when we all thought that Black Mesa wasn’t going to be released… which would probably be posted the day after it was finally released. :hmph:

But no, this forum will remain alive, whether to talk about the mod, or to talk about other things pertaining to life. As I see it, this forum is used for more things other than Black Mesa. It’ll be fine.

Read full topic

item.title: When Black Mesa Is Released: What Then?
item.dc:creator: Defender
item.description:
Torpede:

When Black Mesa is finally released, what does that mean? The community–will it die out? No more funny threads with our favorite community? No more complaining about the mod not being released? No more hype about the epic mod? No more flame wars over trivial subjects? No more Raminator? What will happen?

What do YOU predict?

By the time this mod is released, everyone in the community will be dead from old age. So, what then? I guess there will be no what then.

Hey, does anyone remember that scene in the movie AI when the future found the boy AI at the end of the movie? I’m guessing that will be kind like what happens here. In 2246 a group of adventurers will unearth the DVD labeled Black Mesa and it will be so archaic that they will simply dismiss it and toss it out, since it will no longer be able to be played on any type of media, LOL.

Read full topic
item.source: When Black Mesa Is Released: What Then?
